channel.title: Need help with unhandled packet please
channel.description:
Ok when I run my server I can't do anything...
Can't equip anything, can't teleport, use commands... Nothing...
Ok this is what I'm getting
[code]Dark-Revolution - Online - Connection accepted from ---------. Client type: high memory version UserId: 12875102 Owner Nick is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 [client-1-Owner Nick]: Loading finished. [client-1-Owner Nick]: Unhandled packet [132, InterFaceId: 57767, size=6]: ]0B 0 9 AA 27 63 E1[ [client-1-Owner Nick]: Action Button: 154328 [client-1-Owner Nick]: Loading finished.[/code]
Now...
[code][client-1-Owner Nick]: Unhandled packet [132, InterFaceId: 57767, size=6]: ]0B 0 9 AA 27 63 E1[[/code]
Unhandled packet...
Now... [code] case 132: int objectX = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA(); int objectID = inStream.readUnsignedWord(); int objectY = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); int face = 0; int face2 = 0; int GateID = 1;
if(isRunning == true){ isRunning = false; wasRunning = true; [/code]
[code]if(isRunning == true){ isRunning = false; wasRunning = true; [/code]
That's what I've recently added...
And I'm not getting any compile errors...
I got no idea what's wrong :\

item.title: Need help with unhandled packet please
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

To be honest, that unhandled packet doesn’t really matter, its not like it crashes your server.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with unhandled packet please

item.title: Need help with unhandled packet please
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

Can someone tell me why I’m getting an unhandled packet, or how to fix it…

Please…

I’ve been through tons of errors, and it’s down to this last one… After a week…

Help is very much appreciated.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with unhandled packet please
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

[code]Case 132:

int objectX = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA();
int objectID = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
int objectY = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
[/code]
?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with unhandled packet please

item.title: Need help with unhandled packet please
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Your packets are probably handled in a switch statement.
Add a case for 132.

Here’s the crap that’s sent by the client:

int objectX = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA();
int objectID = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
int objectY = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with unhandled packet please

item.title: Need help with unhandled packet please
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

Nevermind that…

I don’t need that at the moment…

I just don’t see why I can’t equip anything etc.

I delete the
if(isRunning == true){
isRunning = false;
wasRunning = true;
because it isn’t needed yet.

My PK portal worked, which was strange, none of the others did…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 15, 2008, 03:35:05 PM[/size][hr][code] Dark-Revolution

  • Online -
    Connection accepted from ---------.
    Client type: high memory version
    UserId: 54719626
    Owner Nick is signing onto server.
    LOADED: 3
    [client-1-Owner Nick]: Loading finished.
    [client-1-Owner Nick]: Unhandled packet [132, InterFaceId: 128, size=6]: ]0B 19
    98 27 61 00[
    [client-1-Owner Nick]: Action Button: 146324
    [client-1-Owner Nick]: Unhandled packet [132, InterFaceId: 16550, size=6]: ]0B 1
    9 98 27 61 40[
    [client-1-Owner Nick]: Action Button: 146324
    [client-1-Owner Nick]: Unhandled packet [132, InterFaceId: 16550, size=6]: ]0B 1
    9 98 27 61 40[
    [client-1-Owner Nick]: Action Button: 146324
    [client-1-Owner Nick]: Unhandled packet [132, InterFaceId: 16550, size=6]: ]0B 1
    9 98 27 61 40[
    [client-1-Owner Nick]: Action Button: 146324
    [client-1-Owner Nick]: Unhandled packet [132, InterFaceId: 16550, size=6]: ]0B 1
    9 98 27 61 40[
    [client-1-Owner Nick]: Action Button: 146324
    [client-1-Owner Nick]: Unhandled packet [132, InterFaceId: 16550, size=6]: ]0B 1
    9 98 27 61 40[
    [client-1-Owner Nick]: Action Button: 146324
    [client-1-Owner Nick]: Unhandled packet [132, InterFaceId: 16550, size=6]: ]0B 1
    9 98 27 61 40[
    [client-1-Owner Nick]: Action Button: 146324
    [client-1-Owner Nick]: Unhandled packet [132, InterFaceId: 166, size=6]: ]0B 1C
    97 27 64 00[
    [client-1-Owner Nick]: Action Button: 148329
    [client-1-Owner Nick]: Loading finished.
    [/code]

I just got that.

I want to know why the packet is unhandled, or how to fix it…

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with unhandled packet please
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

Ok when I run my server I can’t do anything…

Can’t equip anything, can’t teleport, use commands…
Nothing…

Ok this is what I’m getting

[code]Dark-Revolution

  • Online -
    Connection accepted from ---------.
    Client type: high memory version
    UserId: 12875102
    Owner Nick is signing onto server.
    LOADED: 3
    [client-1-Owner Nick]: Loading finished.
    [client-1-Owner Nick]: Unhandled packet [132, InterFaceId: 57767, size=6]: ]0B 0
    9 AA 27 63 E1[
    [client-1-Owner Nick]: Action Button: 154328
    [client-1-Owner Nick]: Loading finished.[/code]

Now…

[client-1-Owner Nick]: Unhandled packet [132, InterFaceId: 57767, size=6]: ]0B 0 9 AA 27 63 E1[

Unhandled packet…

Now…

[code] case 132:
int objectX = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA();
int objectID = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
int objectY = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
int face = 0;
int face2 = 0;
int GateID = 1;

if(isRunning == true){
isRunning = false;
wasRunning = true;
[/code]

if(isRunning == true){ isRunning = false; wasRunning = true;

That’s what I’ve recently added…

And I’m not getting any compile errors…

I got no idea what’s wrong :\
